description: The pagination variant.

type: default | primary | secondary | success | warning | danger
description: The pagination color theme.
The pagination size.
The pagination border radius.
The total number of pages.
The number of pages that are added or subtracted on the '...' button.
The initial page. (uncontrolled)
The current page. (controlled)
The number of pages to show before and after the current page.
The number of pages to show at the beginning and end of the pagination.
Whether the pagination should be looped.
Whether the pagination should have a compact style.
Whether the pagination is disabled.
Whether the pagination cursor should have a shadow.
Whether the pagination should have controls.
Whether the pagination cursor should be hidden.
Whether the pagination cursor should be animated.
The pagination item render function.
A function that allows you to customize the pagination items aria-label.
Allows to set custom class names for the pagination slots.
